awe6.interfaces.ITools

type
interface
implements
IEncrypter
The ITools interface should be implemented by objects intended to provide tool box functionality.

Many of these tools are need in the minimalist implementation of the interfaces.

The other functions are often regularly used in entity creation.

Instance Variables

BIG_NUMBER(default,null) : Int

Used as an arbitrarily high number to avoid infinity and division by zero issues.

Instance Methods

convertAgeToFormattedTime( age : Int, ?delimiter : String ) : String

parameters
age The time elapsed in the duration as milliseconds.
?delimiter The character used to separate the components (default: "'").
returns
String representing a clock in the format "hh:mm:ss".
Creates a string representing a clock in the format "hh'mm'ss".

convertUpdatesToFormattedTime( updates : Int, ?delimiter : String ) : String

parameters
updates The update cycles elapsed in the duration.
?delimiter The character used to separate the components (default: "'").
returns
String representing a clock in the format "hh:mm:ss".
Creates a string representing a clock in the format "hh'mm'ss".

Uses IFactory.targetFramerate to determine the duration from updates.

createGuid( ?isSmall : Bool, ?prefix : String ) : String

parameters
?isSmall If true returns an 8 bit identifier, 16 bit otherwise.
?prefix Adds characters to the front of the GUID.
returns
A Globally Unique Identifier.
Creates a Globally Unique Identifier.

ease( originalValue : Float, newValue : Float, ease : Float ) : Float

parameters
originalValue Value A.
newValue Value B.
ease The proportion of A:B.
returns
The proportional value of A:B.
Find the tween of two values.

fromCamelCase( value : String ) : String

parameters
value The camelCase string to revert.
returns
Word or phrase.
Reverts a camelCase string to a word or phrase.

E.g. "thisExampleString" becomes "this example string".

fromConstCase( value : String ) : String

parameters
value The CONST_CASE string to revert.
returns
Word or phrase.
Reverts a CONST_CASE string to a word or phrase.

E.g. "THIS_EXAMPLE_STRING" becomes "this example string"

getRandomType<T>( e : Enum<getRandomType.T> ) : getRandomType.T

Creates any enumerator from the supplied class.

intToHex( value : Int ) : String

parameters
value The Int to convert.
returns
Hex value.
Converts an Int to a Hex string.

isBool( value : Dynamic ) : Bool

parameters
value The value to check.
returns
True if the value is true.
Determine whether a value is true.

Results vary based on the context of checked value. Usually safer to do your own Bool checks.

isEven( value : Int ) : Bool

parameters
value The value to check.
returns
True if value divisible by two.
Divisible by two.

isOdd( value : Int ) : Bool

parameters
value The value to check.
returns
True if value not divisible by two.
Not divisible by two.

limit( value : Float, min : Float, max : Float ) : Float

parameters
value The value to clamp.
min The floor.
max The ceiling.
returns
Value >= floor and <= ceiling.
Clamps a value between a floor and ceiling boundary.

nearestSquare( value : Float ) : Int

parameters
value The value to check.
returns
A square number nearest to the value.
Calculate the nearest square number to a given value.

Useful for performance routines.

range( value : Float, min : Float, max : Float ) : Float

parameters
value The value to wrap.
min The floor.
max The ceiling.
returns
A value between floor and ceiling proportional to over or under shoot.
Wraps a value between a floor and ceiling boundary.

serialize( value : Dynamic ) : String

parameters
value The object to convert.
returns
The serialized object.
Converts an object into a serialized string.

sgn( value : Float ) : Int

parameters
value The value to check.
returns
-1 if <0, 1 if >0, 0 otherwise.
Determine whether a value is less than zero, equal to zero or greater than zero.

shuffle<T>( array : Array<shuffle.T> ) : Array<shuffle.T>

Randomly sorts an array.

parameters
a Value A.
b Value B.
returns
-1 if AB or 0 if A==B.
Sorting function for Int collections.

-1 if AB or 0 if A==B.

Replaces two objects with the content of the other.

toCamelCase( value : String, ?isUpper : Bool ) : String

parameters
value The string to transform.
?isUpper If true returns PascalCase (first character uppercased).
returns
camelCase or PascalCase representation of a string.
Turns a word or sentence into camelCase.

E.g. "this example string" becomes "thisExampleString".

toConstCase( value : String ) : String

parameters
value The string to transform.
returns
CONST_CASE representation of a string.
Turns a word of sentence into CONST_CASE.

E.g. "this example string" becomes "THIS_EXAMPLE_STRING".

toUpperCaseFirst( value : String ) : String

parameters
value The string to transform.
returns
Copy of a string with the first character uppercased.
Creates a copy of a string with the first character uppercased.

toWords( value : String ) : String

parameters
value ThecamelCase or CONST_CASE string.
returns
Word or phrase.
Reverts either a camelCase or CONST_CASE string to a word or phrase.

parameters

returns
The object to restore.
Restores an object from a serialized string.
